what is the real reason mayonnaise was i: Mayonnaise was invented as a way to preserve food. The combination of oil, vinegar, and eggs creates a stable emulsion that helps prevent spoilage. It was originally created in the 18th century by the French chef of the Duke de Richelieu as a way to make a creamy sauce that could be stored for long periods of time.
